forgotPasswordDialog.title: Reset Your Password
forgotPasswordDialog.description: Please enter your email address. We will send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordDialog.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
forgotPasswordDialog.success: Password reset link has been sent to your email address.
forgotPasswordDialog.userNotFound: No user found with this email address.
forgotPasswordDialog.error: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again later.
forgotPasswordDialog.connectionError: Connection error. Please check your internet connection.

resend.failed: E-Mail konnte nicht gesendet werden. Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut.
